title: Italic serif w/ old style upper case "R"
content:
Font: 

 Modified Adobe Jenson Pro (Light Italic) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317115132/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Psychological Record cover.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317115132/http:/typophile.com/files/Psychological%20Record%20cover.jpg) | 121.3 KB |
author: markg99

comments.content:
It must be an **[Adobe Jenson Pro (Light Italic)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317115132/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Adobe%20Jenson%20Pro%20-%20Light%20Italic&fid=26dd3c482198cf1a9c2a3a48443ef305&fsize=60&text=The%20Psychological%20Record&wrap=2)** with a modified /R  
(There are some swash alternates of /R but not the one shown in the sample)

Thank you so much.  
 I looked at a bunch of similar fonts and passed over Adobe Jenson since it didn't have that alternate character.

-Mark
